title: SATCOM Vehicular Terminal
explain: SATCOM vehicular terminal supports multiple types of satellite communication service and high transmission rate, as well as supports Beidou B1/B3 navigation function. It equipped with “communication-on-the-move” antenna, and three-proof design is adopted to satisfy the operation in atrocious environment.
form:
Main Specifications
Operation networksatellite mobile communication
Servicevoice, data (1.2~384kbps), short message, FAX and video
Navigation positioningBeidou/GPS，positioning accuracy 10m/4m
External interfaceSupporting Blue Teeth
Operational temperature-20℃~60℃
Stand by and call timestand by time≥48 hours, call time≥8 hours
